text: So I assume with `responsive_breakpoints` in `theme.json` being an array of objects, that the plan is to support multiple/custom breakpoints in the future (currently only “mobile” supported). It’s been at least 4 months since this was added, any news or updates on the progress of this?

Hey Dustin, the short answer is yes we plan to expand this functionality, and no we don’t have a hard ETA just yet.

The long answer:
There are actually a lot of intermingled features that we want to get right with the responsive breakpoints functionality before we support additional breakpoints. If done poorly we risk providing a developer or content creator experience that is confusing or difficult to work with. Being such a fundamental functionality it’s hard to make changes to it once it’s released. Stay tuned. We’ll definitely communicate when we open up that functionality via the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|developer changelog.>
